university.name: Università degli Studi di Torino
university.notes: 174 degree programs across 6 schools and 27 departments (8 centers of excellence). Areas: juridical, political-social, economic, healthcare, humanities, scientific, agricultural/veterinary.

admissions.notes: Pre-iscrizione su MyUniTo dal 22/9 al 14/10. ISEE automaticamente recuperato da INPS.

tuition.notes: No Tax Area - only fixed fees

tuition.payment_schedule_notes: 4 installments. Third rate due March 31. Fourth rate due May 29. Late ISEE (after Nov 21 - before Feb 27): €150 late fee.
tuition.notes: No tax area at €26,000 ISEE. Tax simulator available: simulatore.tasse.unito.it. ISEE auto-retrieved from INPS.

scholarships.description: Regional scholarship covering tuition, accommodation, meals
scholarships.notes: EDISU Piemonte regional agency manages scholarships for Piedmont universities.
